name: Test Drive (itch) (Tex122)
description:
Hello and Welcome to Test Drive a serious game about awareness of the road rules, where we will teach you 5 road rules in a live city environment. This Studio 2 Game Development Project is still in the prototype stage so just keep that in mind. So we can balance our game we would really appreciate it if you could fill out the form below after Playing our Game :) Thanks in advance.

Playtest Form

Controls:

WASD ------------------ Movement

Space ------------------- HandBrake

Q & E ------------------- Left & Right Indicators

Esc ---------------------- Pause

A Game by Immortal Four:   

Ihsan -------------------- Project Manager/Programmer

Amit --------------------- Lead Programmer/ Build Manager

Aaron ------------------- Level Designer/ Artist

Brandon ---------------- Sound Designer / Modeler / Programmer
